mapper.select: select stop.S_NUM, stop.S_NAME, stop.S_X, stop.S_Y, ROUTESTOPCOPY.RS_ORDER from stop, ROUTESTOPCOPY where stop.S_NUM = ROUTESTOPCOPY.S_NUM and ROUTESTOPCOPY.R_ID = #{r_id} ORDER BY ROUTESTOPCOPY.RS_ORDER
